ca.concordia.risk.game.Continent

Packages that use Continent
Package Description
ca.concordia.risk.game  

  • Uses of Continent in ca.concordia.risk.game

    Methods in ca.concordia.risk.game that return Continent
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Continent Country.getContinent()
    Gets the continent that this country belongs to.
    Continent GameMap.getContinent​(java.lang.String p_continentName)
    Gets a continent with the corresponding name if it exists.
    Methods in ca.concordia.risk.game that return types with arguments of type Continent
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Continent> GameMap.getContinents()
    Gets a list of all continents in the map.
    java.util.Set<Continent> Player.getOwnedContinents()
    This method computes the set of continents that are fully captured by the player.
    Methods in ca.concordia.risk.game with parameters of type Continent
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean GameMap.addContinent​(Continent p_continent)
    Adds a continent to the map if a continent with the same name does not already exist.
    Constructors in ca.concordia.risk.game with parameters of type Continent
    Constructor Description
    Country​(java.lang.String p_countryName, Continent p_continent)
    Creates a new Country.
